Do you have steps to reproduce ? Was it in R2.0 or R1.0 ?

This should be in 1.0. In 2.0 we added a extra check in this method
!field.isField() in order to prevent a class cast exception to be thrown on the
line:
element = new RecoveredInitializer((Initializer) field, null, 1, this);

This is also what I recall. 

Venugopal - can you confirm this occurred in 1.0 ?
